[sh_fa link="disable" size="2x" fontcolor="rgb(255, 255, 255)" iconset="linear" iconlinear=" icon-thumbs-up2"][/sh_fa]All shortcodes can be used in widget areas as well.  Something else you would like to see?  We have a dedicated feature request area in our support forum...let us know!

I have several themes from Mojo and based on quality coding and EXCELLENT TOP NOTCH SUPPORT, this theme overall tops them all. The design and features are great! Thanks for staying ontop of updates and support![/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial name="Debi Stangeland" title="Credence Owner"]I consider CREDENCE the Ferrari of WP themes. It's unbelievable. It is so responsive and the options are virtually unlimited. The more I play with this theme, the more I love it. My site is amazingly professional looking, with quality elements that are powerful and effective and yet, it is simple to set-up, use, and change. I couldn't ask for anything more in a theme. This is one I'll use for a long time because of it's flexibility.[/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial name="Benjamin" title="Credence Owner"]Wow - great theme, incredibly versatile, easy to use, looks great, easy to use and the support team turn-around was amazingly quick. Highly recommended![/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial title="Credence Owner"]First time using WordPress.... After previewing MANY Themes, I chose this theme based on look and features. I am Extremely pleased with my decision.... Love this Theme and my new site!! Excellent support and fast. Thanks!![/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial name="cbeck3" title="Credence Owner"]This new theme is the best I have viewed. It is loaded with many tools. I look forward to using this product now and into the future.[/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial name="Yotels" title="Credence Owner"]Finally, an impressive theme with a great design! You could tell a lot of work has gone into this. Thank you![/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial title="Credence Owner"]Amazing people and amazing theme!! RECOMENDED 100%!! if you buy it you will have the best support![/shvc_testimonial][/shvc_testimonialc][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/shvc_imagebg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439393776771{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#ededed" fontcolor="#444444"][vc_column_text]

item.title: Element - Alert Messages
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"] Alert Boxes with Close [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="disable" icon="fa fa-glass"] This is a General Purpose message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="disable" type="info" icon="fa fa-glass"] This is an Informational message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="disable" type="success" icon="fa fa-glass"] This is a Successful message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="disable" type="warning" icon="fa fa-glass"] This is a Warning message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="disable" type="error" icon="fa fa-glass"] This is an Error message box. [/sh_alert][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"] Alert Boxes with Icons [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" icon="fa fa-thumbs-o-up"] This is a General Purpose message box. Use icons if you like! [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" type="info" icon="fa fa-info-circle"] This is an Informational message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" type="success" icon="fa fa-check-square-o"] This is a Successful message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" type="warning" icon="fa fa-unlock-alt"] This is a Warning message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" type="error" icon="fa fa-exclamation-triangle"] This is an Error message box. [/sh_alert][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"] Simple Alert Boxes [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][sh_alert close="disable" enablefont="disable" icon="fa fa-thumbs-o-up"] This is a General Purpose message box. Use icons if you like! [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="disable" enablefont="disable" type="info" icon="fa fa-info-circle"] This is an Informational message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="disable" enablefont="disable" type="success" icon="fa fa-check-square-o"] This is a Successful message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="disable" enablefont="disable" type="warning" icon="fa fa-unlock-alt"] This is a Warning message box. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="disable" enablefont="disable" type="error" icon="fa fa-exclamation-triangle"] This is an Error message box. [/sh_alert][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"] Even create your own custom colored alerts [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" type="custom" background="rgba(255,255,255,0.91)" bordercolor="rgba(2,2,2,0.15)" icon="fa fa-bookmark"] Use any color font, any color background, and any color border. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" type="custom" background="rgba(52,85,193,0.92)" fontcolor="#efefef" bordercolor="#1332f9" icon="fa fa-check-circle"] Credence gives you the most options to customize your site. [/sh_alert][sh_alert close="enable" enablefont="enable" type="custom" background="rgba(255,94,94,0.91)" fontcolor="#efefef" icon="fa fa-heart"] Why? Because we love you guys! [/sh_alert][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1440056207587{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#eeeeee" fontcolor="#444444"][vc_empty_space height="30px"][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] Features [/sh_headerdouble][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][shvc_checklist iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-check-square"][shvc_checklist_item] Toggle enabling the close message functionality [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Toggle enabling the icon before your message [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Set a custom size for your text [/shvc_checklist_item][/shvc_checklist][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][shvc_checklist iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-check-square"][shvc_checklist_item] Choose preset styles or create a custom colored message box [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Use any included Font icons with your message [/shvc_checklist_item][/shvc_checklist][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="30px"][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Element - Callout Boxes
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][sh_header size="h4" header="Callout Boxes" colorchange="enable" color="#555555" barwidth="50px" barcolor="#e74c3c" summary="Callout boxes help you to direct readers to certain content, with Credence they are powerful and easy to create!"]
Callout boxes are an amazing way to grab people's attention. With Credence you have so many options.
[/sh_header][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][sh_headerdouble size="h5"]
Amazing Callout Boxes
[/sh_headerdouble][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_callout title="Spin The Icons" bordersize="2px" backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#555555" buttonenable="enable" buttonlink="#" buttontarget="_self" buttonfontcolor="#ffffff" buttonbgcolor="#dd4040" iconspin="enable" iconfontcolor="#ffffff" iconbgcolor="#dd4040" buttontext="Read More" icon="fa fa-star"]
You can choose to have the icons spin, or not. You can even choose not to have an icon, or even have an image.
[/sh_callout][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_callout title="Stationary Icon" bordersize="2px" backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#555555" buttonenable="enable" buttonlink="#" buttontarget="_self" buttonfontcolor="#ffffff" buttonbgcolor="#dd4040" iconspin="disable" iconfontcolor="#ffffff" iconbgcolor="#dd4040" buttontext="Read More" icon="fa fa-star"]
You can choose to have the icons spin, or not. You can even choose not to have an icon, or even have an image.

You can choose to have the icons spin, or not. You can even choose not to have an icon, or even have an image.
[/sh_callout][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_callout title="Unlimited Colors" bordercolor="rgba(10,10,10,0.15)" bordersize="2px" backgroundcolor="#1abc9c" fontcolor="#ffffff" buttonenable="enable" buttonlink="#" buttontarget="_self" buttonfontcolor="#ffffff" buttonbgcolor="#555555" iconspin="disable" iconfontcolor="#ffffff" iconbgcolor="#555555" icon="fa fa-arrow-circle-o-up" buttontext="Read More"]

[/sh_callout][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_callout title="Unlimited Colors" bordercolor="rgba(10,10,10,0.15)" bordersize="2px" borderradius="6px" backgroundcolor="#3498db" fontcolor="#555555" buttonenable="enable" buttonlink="#" buttontarget="_self" buttonfontcolor="#555555" buttonbgcolor="#ffffff" iconspin="disable" iconfontcolor="#555555" iconbgcolor="#ffffff" icon="fa fa-check" buttontext="Read More"]

You can make the boxes any color you would like, set backgrounds font colors for all items.
[/sh_callout][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][sh_callout title="Wide Callout" bordercolor="rgba(0,0,0,0.25)" bordersize="1px" backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#555555" buttonenable="disable" iconenable="disable" icon="fa fa-glass"]
Have a wide callout if you would like. They expand to their container so you can have them fit in columns or be full width. You can also control the border sizes, colors and radius!
[/sh_callout][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][sh_headerdouble size="h5"]
Flipping Callouts
[/sh_headerdouble][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_callout callouttype="flip" title="Flipping Callout" bordersize="2px" borderradius="4px" backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#555555" flipcolor="#ffffff" flipbgcolor="#555555" buttonenable="enable" buttonlink="#" buttontarget="_self" buttonfontcolor="#ffffff" buttonbgcolor="#dd4040" iconfontcolor="#ffffff" iconbgcolor="#dd4040" buttontext="Read More" icon="fa fa-cog" fliptext="This is the backside of the flipped Callout, Include more content here and a button if you would like. This has a different color than the front."]
Have your callouts flip for a nice effect. You can put content on the front and back of these boxes, you can even have different colors for the front and back as well!
[/sh_callout][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_callout callouttype="flip" title="Flipping Callout" bordersize="2px" borderradius="4px" backgroundcolor="#777777" fontcolor="#ffffff" flipcolor="#ffffff" flipbgcolor="#555555" buttonenable="enable" buttonlink="#" buttontarget="_self" buttonfontcolor="#ffffff" buttonbgcolor="#dd4040" iconspin="enable" iconfontcolor="#ffffff" iconbgcolor="#dd4040" buttontext="Read More" icon="fa fa-road" fliptext="This is the backside of the flipped Callout, Include more content here and a button if you would like. item.title: Element - Countdown
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[sh_header size="h4" colorchange="disable" barheight="2px" barwidth="50px" barcolor="#E74C3C" header="Countdown Timers"]Countdowns are useful for events. With [sh_highlight choice="foreground" color="accentcolor"]Credence[/sh_highlight], you can even have multiple countdowns on the same page![/sh_header] [sh_headerdouble size="h4"]Simple Countdown[/sh_headerdouble] [sh_countdown color="#555" style="simple" date="11 August 2017 00:00:00"] [sh_headerdouble size="h4"]Bordered Countdown[/sh_headerdouble] [sh_countdown color="#555" style="bordered" date="10 August 2017 00:00:05"]   [sh_headerdouble size="h4"]Tiled Countdown[/sh_headerdouble] [sh_countdown color="#555" style="tiles" date="4 September 2017 00:00:00"] [sh_countdown color="#e74c3c" style="tiles" date="4 September 2017 05:15:22"]   [sh_headerdouble size="h5"]Options[/sh_headerdouble] [sh_checklist icon=" fa fa-check" type="unordered" background="enable"] [sh_checklist_item]Any Color Font.[/sh_checklist_item] [sh_checklist_item]Multiple Counters on the same page.[/sh_checklist_item] [sh_checklist_item]Each counter can have a different time.[/sh_checklist_item] [sh_checklist_item]Create in shortcodes or Visual Composer.[/sh_checklist_item] [sh_checklist_item]Choose from 3 styles.[/sh_checklist_item] [/sh_checklist]   [sh_headerdouble size="h5"]Have fun with them[/sh_headerdouble]   [sh_parallax backgroundchoice="parallax" overlaycolor="rgba(255,255,255,0.50)" fontcolor="#555" background="http://demo.sh-themes.com/credencebeta/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/dodl.jpg"]  

Coming Soon...

  [sh_countdown color="#e74c3c" style="tiles" date="4 September 2015 00:00:00"]   [/sh_parallax]

item.title: Element - Testimonials

[/sh_header][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][shvc_testimonial name="Jim Myers" title="Credence Owner" image="221"] Testimonials are actually very easy to create.  Credence gives you the choice of using the Shortcode Generator or Visual Composer.  You can add images, and the testimonial adapts to the content area so you can use columns to have more per line. item.title: Element - Contact Forms
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][sh_header size="h4" header="Contact Forms" colorchange="enable" color="#555555" barwidth="50px" barcolor="#e74c3c"] Credence even includes a contact form element [/sh_header][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text] The Contact Form Element gives you a quick way to add a contact method anywhere to your site.  Since the form is responsive, it will fit nicely in column layouts.  Contact Form 7 and Gravity Forms are also completely compatible. [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][sh_form buttonbg="#e74c3c" buttoncolor="#ffffff" buttonborder="rgba(85,85,85,0.01)"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text] Easily adjust your contact form colors to work with different backgrounds and background colors. Set font colors, field colors and border colors to what you want. [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][sh_form messagetext="Tell Us About Yourself" inputtext="#ffffff" inputbg="rgba(0,0,0,0.26)" inputborder="#222222" buttontext="Send it" buttonbg="#555555" buttoncolor="#ffffff" buttonborderw="2px" borderradius="4px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="50px"][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] Feature Highlights [/sh_headerdouble][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][shvc_checklist iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-check-square" background="enable" customcolor="true" backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#e74c3c"][shvc_checklist_item] Form uses wordpress email [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Available in Generator and Visual Composer [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Customize the placeholder text [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Customize button text [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Have multiple forms on a single page [/shvc_checklist_item][/shvc_checklist][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][shvc_checklist iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-check-square" background="enable" customcolor="true" backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#e74c3c"][shvc_checklist_item] Change button colors [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Change button border width and color [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Add a border radius to all form inputs [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Form fields are validated [/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item] Recipient can be set per form [/shvc_checklist_item][/shvc_checklist][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="180px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

All of the above styles can also be created as short dividers as well. [sh_divider style="single" shwidth="short" spacetop="20px" spacebottom="20px"] [sh_divider style="double" shwidth="short" spacetop="20px" spacebottom="20px"] [sh_divider style="dashed" shwidth="short" spacetop="20px" spacebottom="20px"] [sh_divider style="dotted" shwidth="short" spacetop="20px" spacebottom="20px"] [sh_divider style="shadow" shwidth="short" spacetop="20px" spacebottom="20px"] [sh_divider style="lookdown" shwidth="short" spacetop="20px" spacebottom="20px"]    

Return to top available for all styles

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Element - Popover & Tooltips

item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][sh_header size="h4" header="Popovers and Tooltips" colorchange="enable" color="#555555" barwidth="50px" barcolor="#e74c3c"] Use [sh_popover placement="top" title="Oh...And Style Them" pcontent="Credence Popovers give you powerful styling control, so use the colors you want! " trigger="hover" colorchange="enable" titlecolor="#fff" titlebgcolor="rgb(231, 76, 60)" fontcolor="#6D6D6D" bgcolor="#fff" bordercolor="rgb(231, 76, 60)"]Popovers [/sh_popover] and [sh_tooltip placement="bottom" title="Here's a tip!"]Tooltips[/sh_tooltip] in your content [/sh_header][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] Tooltips [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][sh_callout callouttype="flip" title="Tooltips are great!" bordercolor="rgba(25,25,25,0.15)" bordersize="1px" borderradius="4px" backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#555555" flipcolor="#555555" flipbgcolor="#ffffff" buttonenable="enable" buttonlink="#" buttontarget="_self" buttonfontcolor="#ffffff" buttonbgcolor="#dd4040" iconfontcolor="#ffffff" iconbgcolor="#555555" icon="fa fa-comment" fliptext="Tooltips can be set to the top, left, right, or bottom of an element. Use them where you need them!" buttontext="Ready To Buy?"] Tooltips can be used to add more information to other elements. [/sh_callout][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text] Lorem [sh_tooltip placement="left" title="Here's a mighty fine tooltip!"]Here's a left one[/sh_tooltip] sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut [sh_tooltip placement="right" title="Here's a mighty fine tooltip!"]Here's a right one[/sh_tooltip] enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation [sh_tooltip placement="top" title="Here's a mighty fine tooltip!"]Tooltip above[/sh_tooltip] ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore [sh_tooltip placement="bottom" title="Here's a mighty fine tooltip!"]Here's one below[/sh_tooltip] eu fugiat nulla pariatur. item.title: Element - Image Frames
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][sh_header size="h4" header="Image Frames" colorchange="enable" color="#555555" barwidth="50px" barcolor="#e74c3c"] Showcase your images in beauty and style [/sh_header][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]
Make your images look beautiful with any size and color border, and padding.

[sh_divider style="doubledash" shwidth="wide" spacetop="0px" spacebottom="20px" totop="disable"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][sh_imageframe bordersize="1px" padding="5px" source="3270"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][sh_imageframe bordersize="1px" padding="10px" source="3267"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

[sh_divider style="doubledash" shwidth="wide" spacetop="0px" spacebottom="20px" totop="disable"]

item.title: Element - Progress Bars
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][sh_header size="h4" header="Progress Bars" colorchange="enable" color="#555555" barwidth="50px" barcolor="#e74c3c"]
Use them to show progress, skills or anything you like
[/sh_header][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][sh_pullquote side="center"]
Progress bars (or skill bars) give you the choice to show progress or percents in a visually appealing way. Credence gives you many choices with progress bars.
[/sh_pullquote][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][sh_progress barcolor="#2ecc71" textcolor="#555555" background="rgba(46,204,113,0.16)" padding="10px" text="Buyers that love Credence" percent="98"][sh_progress style="striped" barcolor="#dd3939" textcolor="#ffffff" background="rgba(221,59,59,0.15)" padding="10px" text="Buyers that love Credence" percent="98"][sh_progress style="pulse" barcolor="#1e73be" textcolor="#ffffff" background="rgba(30,115,190,0.15)" padding="10px" text="Buyers that love Credence" percent="98"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"]
Choose any bar, text or background color
[/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][sh_progress barcolor="#2980b9" textcolor="#ffffff" padding="10px" text="Work Completed" percent="56"][sh_progress barcolor="#f1c40f" textcolor="#555555" background="rgba(241,196,15,0.42)" padding="10px" text="Work Completed" percent="81"][sh_progress barcolor="#16a085" textcolor="#4c4c4c" background="rgba(22,160,133,0.13)" padding="10px" text="Work Completed" percent="78"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"]
Make them wide and thin
[/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][sh_progress barcolor="#34495e" textcolor="#ffffff" background="rgba(52,73,94,0.31)" padding="5px" text="Work Completed" percent="56"][sh_progress barcolor="#f39c12" textcolor="#e2e2e2" background="rgba(243,156,18,0.3)" padding="10px" text="Work Completed" percent="81"][sh_progress barcolor="#34495e" textcolor="#ffffff" background="rgba(52,73,94,0.16)" padding="15px" text="Work Completed" percent="78"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"]
Make them Striped and Pulse
[/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][sh_progress style="striped" barcolor="#34495e" textcolor="#ffffff" background="rgba(52,73,94,0.31)" padding="5px" text="Work Completed" percent="56"][sh_progress style="striped" barcolor="#f39c12" textcolor="#e2e2e2" background="rgba(243,156,18,0.3)" padding="10px" text="Work Completed" percent="81"][sh_progress style="pulse" barcolor="#34495e" textcolor="#ffffff" background="rgba(52,73,94,0.16)" padding="15px" text="Work Completed" percent="78"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h5"]
Options
[/sh_headerdouble][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][shvc_checklist background="enable" icon="fa fa-check"][shvc_checklist_item]
Create with Shortcode Generator or Visual Composer
[/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item]
Set any color font, bar, and background
[/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item]
Set your own padding for bar height
[/shvc_checklist_item][shvc_checklist_item]
Choose from Solid, Striped, and Pulse style Bars
[/shvc_checklist_item][/shvc_checklist][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][shvc_checklist background="enable" icon="fa fa-check"][shvc_checklist_item]

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Element - Media

item.content:encoded:

Self Hosted Videos

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][sh_video video="selfhosted" id="http://demo.sh-themes.com/credencebeta/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Credence-flight-hd-opt.mp4" poster="320"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] SoundCloud - change colors, autoplay, hide comments [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text][sh_soundcloud color="#33e040" url="https://soundcloud.com/bearded-man-recordings/lost-frequencies-are-you-with-me-1"]   [sh_soundcloud color="#e74c3c" url="https://soundcloud.com/groups/electronic-dance-music-edm-dance-trance-techno-electronic-electro-progressive-house-instrumental-vocal-melodies-producers-musicians-dj-s"][/vc_column_text][sh_soundcloud color="#2fcecb" url="https://soundcloud.com/monstercat/fool-keep-on-rocking"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] Even Include Google Docs [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text] [sh_gdoc link="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hnrbj55SDCnRbaiG5wla3s9jtygB_AkXXQ3X6ZHfDHo/edit?usp=sharing" height="600" seamless="true"] [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Element - Google Maps
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1408726081296{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Google Maps

[sh_divider style="single" shwidth="wide" spacetop="5px" spacebottom="20px" totop="disable"] With Credence you have [sh_highlight choice="foreground" color="light"] extremely powerful [/sh_highlight] map options.  You can create multiple maps on a page.  You can create multiple markers per map and you don't have to worry about geocoding (getting the latitude and longitude yourself).  All you need is the address and Credence does the rest.  You can even add them to sidebars.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][shvc_gmap unique="jAMRin5" bordered="true" zoom="12" zoomcontrol="false" maptype="TERRAIN" changemap="true" mapcolor="#e74c3c" saturation="-25" lightness="25" full_width="false" address="Wheat Ridge, CO 80033" marker="177"] [/shvc_gmap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][sh_divider style="doubledash" spacetop="40px" spacebottom="40px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Amazing Map Customizations

[sh_divider style="single" shwidth="wide" spacetop="5px" spacebottom="20px" totop="disable"] Style your maps any color, use any icon, create multiple points, choose the zoom level you want.  Use HSL (Hue, Saturation and Lightness) to control the exact color level you want to use. Choose to add a border around the map or no border.  Set map widths and heights using pixels or percents.  The [sh_highlight choice="foreground" color="light"]possibilities really are endless[/sh_highlight]...[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][shvc_gmap unique="colors1" height="340px" zoom="16" pancontrol="false" maptypecontrol="false" scrollwheel="false" changemap="true" mapcolor="#1e73be" infoboxbg="rgba(30,115,190,0.94)" infoboxcolor="#f7f7f7" full_width="false" address="140 W 14th Ave Pkwy Denver, CO 80204" marker="219" infobox="DownTown Office 14th Ave Denver, CO 80204"][shvc_gmap_point address="1236 Elati St, Denver, CO" marker="218" infobox="South Office Elati St, Denver"][shvc_gmap_point address="1350 Grant St Denver, CO 80203" marker="217" infobox="East Office Grant St Denver, CO 80203"][/shvc_gmap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][sh_divider style="doubledash" spacetop="40px" spacebottom="40px"][shvc_parallax backgroundchoice="parallax" overlaycolor="rgba(0,0,0,0.57)" fontcolor="#efefef" background="1819"][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1410393101550{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][shvc_gmap unique="jAMRin5" bordered="true" height="250px" zoom="7" scrollwheel="false" infoboxbg="rgba(255,255,255,0.94)" full_width="false" address="Denver Colorado" infobox="Roadmap Map Type"] [/shvc_gmap][vc_empty_space][shvc_gmap unique="jAMRin5" bordered="true" height="250px" zoom="7" zoomcontrol="false" maptypecontrol="false" scrollwheel="false" maptype="SATELLITE" infoboxbg="rgba(255,255,255,0.94)" full_width="false" address="Denver Colorado" infobox="Satellite Map Type"] [/shvc_gmap][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][shvc_gmap unique="jAMRin5" bordered="true" height="250px" zoom="7" zoomcontrol="false" pancontrol="false" scrollwheel="false" maptype="TERRAIN" infoboxbg="rgba(255,255,255,0.94)" full_width="false" address="Denver Colorado" infobox="Terrain Map Type"] [/shvc_gmap][vc_empty_space][shvc_gmap unique="jAMRin5" bordered="true" height="250px" zoom="7" zoomcontrol="false" pancontrol="false" maptypecontrol="false" scrollwheel="false" maptype="HYBRID" infoboxbg="rgba(255,255,255,0.95)" full_width="false" address="Denver Colorado" infobox="Hybrid Map Type"] [/shvc_gmap][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_empty_space height="64px"][vc_column_text]

USE ANY MAP TYPE

You can use all available map types that Google provides (Roadmap, Satellite, Hybrid and Terrain).  You can control what elements you want to allow in the map (like scrolling, panning, zooming and map selection).  Even allow or disallow mouse wheel zooming.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/shvc_parallax][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1410392666145{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][sh_divider style="doubledash" spacetop="40px" spacebottom="40px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1410393057636{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1410392533759{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Make Them Any Size, Even Full Width

[sh_divider style="dashed" shwidth="short" spacetop="5px" spacebottom="0px" totop="disable"][/vc_column_text][shvc_gmap unique="RW7pOXy" fullwidth="true" height="400px" zoom="10" scrollwheel="false" changemap="true" mapcolor="#81d742" infoboxbg="rgba(0,0,0,0.85)" infoboxcolor="#f7f7f7" full_width="true" address="Loveland, Colorado" infobox="Full Width is as easy as changing an option. How about that!" marker="183"] [/shvc_gmap][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Element - Modal Popups
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Modal Popups and Windows

  Credence contains [sh_highlight choice="foreground" color="accentcolor"]Advanced Modal Popups[/sh_highlight] which you can add to your content.  These can be made to load with the page or triggered by a button.  The Modal Popups included in Credence have many options available.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][sh_modal openready="enable" title="A Modal that opens on page load" modalsize="large" modalfont="#555555"][sh_columns number="2"]   [sh_column] [sh_imageframe style="lifted" source="http://demo.sh-themes.com/credencebeta/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/bird_11.png" bordersize="1px" bordercolor="#ccc" padding="5px" action="none"] [/sh_column]   [sh_column] Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem quia voluptas sit aspernatur aut odit aut fugit, sed quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. [/sh_column]   [/sh_columns]   [sh_progress style="striped" padding="7px" barcolor="rgba(0,0,0,0.5)" textcolor="#fff" background="rgba(0,0,0,0.15)" percent="100" symbol="%" text="Be Creative"][/sh_modal][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] Small or Large [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text] Have your modals open in small or large windows. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_modal title="A Smaller Modal" modalfont="#555555" buttontext="Small Modal Window" buttonborderradius="4px"] At vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blanditiis praesentium voluptatum deleniti atque corrupti quos dolores et quas molestias excepturi sint occaecati cupiditate non provident. [/sh_modal][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_modal title="A Larger Modal" modalsize="large" modalfont="#555555" buttontext="Large Modal Window" buttonborderradius="4px"] At vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blanditiis praesentium voluptatum deleniti atque corrupti quos dolores et quas molestias excepturi sint occaecati cupiditate non provident, similique sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollitia animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Et harum quidem rerum facilis est et expedita distinctio. [/sh_modal][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] Style Your Buttons and Modals [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text] With Credence, you can style the modal buttons with any color font, background and border color.  You can also set border size and radius.  You can also change the modal background, font, and border color.  Choose if you want to enable and disable the footer. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_modal title="Styled Modals" modalbg="#34495e" modalfont="#efefef" buttontext="Styled Button" buttoncolor="#34495e" buttontextcolor="#efefef" buttonborderwidth="0px" buttonborderradius="4px"] At vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blanditiis praesentium voluptatum deleniti atque corrupti quos dolores et quas molestias excepturi sint occaecati cupiditate non provident, similique sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollitia animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Et harum quidem rerum facilis est et expedita distinctio. [/sh_modal][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][sh_headerdouble size="h4"] Include just about anything [/sh_headerdouble][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text] Add responsive videos and other shortcodes to your modals.  The possibilities are endless. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sh_modal title="Modal with responsive youtube video" modalsize="large" modalbg="#34495e" modalfont="#efefef" buttontext="Youtube Video" buttonborderradius="4px"][sh_video video="youtube" height="360" width="700" id="F5FEj9U-CJM"]   At vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blanditiis praesentium voluptatum deleniti atque corrupti quos dolores et quas molestias excepturi sint occaecati cupiditate non provident, similique sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollitia animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1421399369930{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1414438379646{margin-top: -20px !important;}"][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439793460560{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1439825559432{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][shvc_parallax backgroundchoice="parallax" overlaycolor="rgba(0,0,0,0.01)" fontcolor="" background="3052"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1439832921702{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner el_class="text-left" width="1/2"][vc_empty_space height="100px"][vc_column_text]

GOODBYE PAINFUL UPDATES

 
Gone are the days of de-activating, uninstalling, re-installing and re-activating included theme plugins.  Some plugins would actually lose their saved data with this method.
Not only do we include automatic updates for the theme itself but included with Credence v2 is an intuitive, state of the art plugin updater that upon theme updates, will notify you of included plugin updates and let you update them with a single click.
[/vc_column_text][sh_btn link="https://www.mojomarketplace.com/item/credence-a-wonderful-multi-purpose-wordpress-theme?r=scripthat-9VHodxN2Fh" enableicon="enable" iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-refresh" size="extralarge" style="dimension" color="#ffffff" bordercolor="#2196f3" bordersize="2" fontcolor="#444444"]LEARN MORE[/sh_btn][vc_empty_space height="20px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][shvc_animate anim="fadeInUp"][vc_single_image image="3028" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1439833427462{margin-bottom: -30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/shvc_animate][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/shvc_parallax][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439834293833{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][shvc_parallax backgroundchoice="parallax" fontcolor="#ffffff" bottomshadow="enable" background="3059"][sh_header size="h4" type="boxed" header="Choose Your Demo" colorchange="enable" color="#ffffff"]A Summary below the header if desired.[/sh_header][/shvc_parallax][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439834200419{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][shvc_parallax backgroundchoice="parallax" overlaycolor="rgba(0,0,0,0.01)" fontcolor="" background="3061"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class="text-left" css=".vc_custom_1439834206312{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][shvc_animate anim="fadeInUp"][vc_single_image image="3038" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1439834234941{margin-bottom: -30px !important;}"][/shvc_animate][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_empty_space height="100px"][vc_column_text]

HELLO EASY IMPORTS

 
Now you can choose from our various demos which one you would like to import with a single click.  We are actively adding new ones to give you greater choices in the demo you would like to start with.
Imports include not only content, but theme settings and sidebar widgets so that you receive a complete site to get you up and running right away.
[/vc_column_text][sh_btn link="https://www.mojomarketplace.com/item/credence-a-wonderful-multi-purpose-wordpress-theme?r=scripthat-9VHodxN2Fh" enableicon="enable" iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-folder-download" size="extralarge" style="dimension" color="#ffffff" bordercolor="#8bc34a" bordersize="2" fontcolor="#444444"]LEARN MORE[/sh_btn][vc_empty_space height="20px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/shvc_parallax][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439831614660{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][shvc_parallax backgroundchoice="parallax" fontcolor="#ffffff" bottomshadow="enable" background="3044"][sh_header size="h4" type="boxed" header="Customize Everything" colorchange="enable" color="#ffffff"]A Summary below the header if desired.[/sh_header][/shvc_parallax][/vc_column][/vc_row]

adapt="false"][shvc_testimonial bgcolor="#ffffff" name="Debi Stangeland"]I consider CREDENCE the Ferrari of WP themes. It’s unbelievable. It is so responsive and the options are virtually unlimited. The more I play with this theme, the more I love it. My site is amazingly professional looking, with quality elements that are powerful and effective and yet, it is simple to set-up, use, and change. I couldn’t ask for anything more in a theme. This is one I’ll use for a long time because of it’s flexibility.[/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial bgcolor="#ffffff" name="Don Niam"]Going to add to a previous review and officially say this is my number one theme. I have several themes from Mojo and based on quality coding and EXCELLENT TOP NOTCH SUPPORT, this theme overall tops them all. The design and features are great! Thanks for staying ontop of updates and support![/shvc_testimonial][shvc_testimonial bgcolor="#ffffff" name="Credence Owner"]First time using WordPress…. After previewing MANY Themes, I chose this theme based on look and features. I am Extremely pleased with my decision…. Love this Theme and my new site!! Excellent support and fast. item.title: Home 7
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1440000579570{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][ess_grid alias="single-row-grid"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1440001661168{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1440001722197{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][shvc_imagebg overlaycolor="rgba(0,0,0,0.01)" fontcolor="" background="3310"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

WELCOME TO OUR CORNER

Come on in and stay awhile, you're going to love it!

[/vc_column_text][sh_video video="selfhosted" id="http://demo.sh-themes.com/credencebeta/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Credence-flight-hd-opt.mp4" poster="320"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/shvc_imagebg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1440002184106{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][ess_grid alias="single-row-grid2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#5cb8b3" arrower="top"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]

Join Us - Wherever you are!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"] [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text] [sh_social placement="bottom" fontcolor="#ffffff" bgcolor="#00aced" icon="fa fa-twitter" link="#" title="Find us on Twitter"][sh_social placement="bottom" fontcolor="#ffffff" bgcolor="#3b5998" icon="fa fa-facebook" link="#" title="Reach us on Facebook"][sh_social placement="bottom" fontcolor="#ffffff" bgcolor="#dd4b39" icon="fa fa-google-plus" link="#" title="See us on Google"][sh_social placement="bottom" fontcolor="#ffffff" bgcolor="#aad450" icon="fa fa-vimeo-square" link="#" title="Check us out at Vimeo"] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_tta_tabs][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-check" title="Drag & Drop Elements" tab_id="1440005781934-4ec68c0c-b8fe" add_icon="true"][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]With our built in Shortcode Generator and Visual Composer you won't have to manually type in shortcodes like other themes.  Just click and select your way through setting them up with ease. You'll also get a whole bunch of powerful and custom page building elements that we include with the theme![/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-download" title="Automatic Updates" tab_id="1440005782153-2ea75a21-e014" add_icon="true"][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text] A Premium theme gives you automatic updates to ensure you have the latest fixes.  When you purchase Credence, not only do we provide fixes, but you'll also receive new features we add along the way.  Each time you are getting features and tools for free! [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-adjust" title="True Color Control" tab_id="1440006519045-5c6554c7-9e5a" add_icon="true"][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]Theme Options lets you set colors for Top Sliders, Navigational Areas, Footer Widgets, Bottom Footer, and general theme accent colors.  Not only that, but many of the included page builder elements can override theme set colors. If you don't want a footer, a slider, or above top navigation area no problem... you can enable or disable any of them.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#eeeeee" fontcolor=""][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]

Pages can have sidebars on them, no sidebars, left sidebars and right sidebars.  Choose your layouts with ease and build them in minutes with the included Page Builder.

[/vc_column_text][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][sh_content color="#ff7043" target="_self" iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-star-empty" readmorelink="#" readmoretext="Learn More" title="Premium Choices"] Included Features that you won't find anywhere else. [/sh_content][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][sh_content color="#e74c3c" target="_self" iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-screen" readmorelink="#" readmoretext="Learn More" title="Responsive Design"] Looks great on all devices, from mobile to desktop. [/sh_content][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][sh_content color="#5cb8b3" target="_self" iconset="linear" iconlinear="icon-magic-wand" readmorelink="#" readmoretext="Learn More" title="Built In Widgets"] Like ranking, Twitter feed, Flickr feed and many more. [/sh_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1440015312368{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1440016534277{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][shvc_imagebg background="3384"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1440016661627{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_separator color="custom" border_width="2" accent_color="#e74c3c"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1440016752503{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 15px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.25) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_empty_space height="25px"][vc_column_text]

Get Your Copy Of The Most Powerful Theme Now

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_empty_space height="25px"][sh_btn link="https://www.mojomarketplace.com/item/credence-a-wonderful-multi-purpose-wordpress-theme?r=scripthat-9VHodxN2Fh" iconfa="fa fa-star-o" size="extralarge" color="rgba(255,0,0,0.01)" bordercolor="#ffffff" bordersize="1" fontcolor="#ffffff"]Purchase Today! [/sh_btn][vc_empty_space height="25px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="50px"][/shvc_imagebg][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Create Just About Any Grid With Any Content And Any Style You Can Imagine.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][ess_grid alias="essgrid"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439969444451{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#eeeeee" fontcolor=""][vc_empty_space][sh_divider style="doubledash" spacetop="5px" spacebottom="5px"][vc_column_text]
Not only do we have built-in portfolio support with a ton of options for layouts.  We've also included the amazing Essential Grid plugin giving you extremely powerful grid layout options.
You can actually customize many styling aspects of the grids to get the exact look and feel you want!  From imagery & video to posts (and pretty much anything in between), we've got you covered.
[/vc_column_text][sh_divider style="doubledash" spacetop="5px" spacebottom="5px"][vc_empty_space][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row]
